recent_accomplishments: Created manifest generation module with PluginManifest, SkillEntry, CommandEntry
Generate plugin.json, commands/*.md, and skills/*/SKILL.md files
Updated CLI to display manifest files in verbose mode

manifest_generation.plugin_json: Generated from trait name with version and author metadata
manifest_generation.command_markdown: Auto-generated from @command annotations with Skill invocation
manifest_generation.linking: Commands automatically invoke paired skills when both annotations present

files_modified: crates/patchwork-compiler/src/codegen.rs - Add manifest tracking and extraction
next_phase: Phase 7: Import/Export System to enable multi-file compilation
